</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(1)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The
	Directors may, with the sanction of an ordinary resolution of the Company
	issue&#160;&#160;bonus shares for which no consideration
	is&#160;&#160;payable to the Company, to the persons registered as holders
	of shares at the close of business
	on:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">

</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	the
	date of the ordinary&#160;&#160;resolution (or such other
	date&#160;&#160;as may be specified therein or determined as therein
	provided); or
</FONT>
</DIV>

</TR>
</TABLE>

<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">

<DIV>

	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	such&#160;&#160;other
	date as may&#160;&#160;be&#160;&#160;determined by&#160;&#160;the
	Directors, in&#160;&#160;proportion to their then holdings of shares;
	and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	in
	proportion to their then holdings of shares and applying such sum on their
	behalf in paying up in full new shares (or, subject to any special rights
	previously conferred on any shares or class of shares for the time being issued)
	for allotment&#160;&#160;and distribution credited as fully paid up to and
	amongst them as bonus shares in the proportion aforesaid.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">

</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(2)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In
	addition and without&#160;&#160;prejudice to&#160;&#160;the powers
	provided for by Article 129(1), the Directors shall have power to issue
	shares for which no consideration is payable and to apply such profits or
	other moneys in paying up in full, in each case on terms that such shares
	shall, upon issue, be held by or for the benefit of participants of any
	share incentive or option scheme or plan implemented by the Company and
	approved by shareholders in general meeting and on such terms as the
	Directors shall think fit.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">

	130.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Implementation of
	resolution
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The
	Directors may do all acts and things considered necessary or expedient to give
	effect to any such bonus issue under Article 129(1), with full power to the
	Directors to make such provisions as they think fit for any fractional
	entitlements which would arise on the basis aforesaid (including provisions
	whereby fractional entitlements are disregarded or the benefit thereof accrues
	to the Company rather than to the members concerned).&#160;&#160;The Directors
	may authorise any person to enter on behalf of all the members interested into
	an agreement with the Company providing for any such bonus issue and matters
	incidental thereto and any agreement made under such authority shall be
	effective and binding on all concerned.
</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	NOTICES
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	131.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Service of
	notices
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(1)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	A
	notice or document (including without limitations a share certificate, any
	accounts, balance sheet or report) may be given by the&#160;&#160;Company
	to any member either personally or by sending it by post to him at his
	registered address, or such other address supplied by him to the Company
	or such permitted alternative form for the giving of notices to
	him.&#160;&#160;Any notice to be sent to a member at an address outside
	Singapore shall be sent by airmail or such permitted alternative
	form.&#160;&#160;Where a notice is sent by post, service of the notice
	shall be deemed to be effected by properly addressing, prepaying and
	posting a letter&#160;&#160;containing the notice, and to have been
	effected in the case of a notice of a meeting on the day after the date of
	its posting, and in any other case at the time at which the letter would
	be delivered in the ordinary course of post.&#160;&#160;Any notice given,
	sent or served using permitted alternative form shall be deemed to have
	been duly given, sent or served upon transmission of the electronic
	communication to the current address of such person or as otherwise
	provided under the Act and/or other applicable regulations or
	procedures.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(2)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Any
	notice on behalf of the Company or of the Directors shall be deemed
	effectual if it purports to bear the signature of the Secretary or other
	duly authorized officer of the Company, whether such signature is printed,
	written or electronically signed.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	132.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Service of notices in
	respect of joint holders
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	A notice
	may be given by the Company to the joint holders of a share by giving the notice
	to the joint holder first named in the Register of Members in respect of the
	share.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	133.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Service of notices
	after death or bankruptcy of a
	member
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	A notice
	may be given by the Company to the persons entitled to a share in consequence of
	the death or bankruptcy of a member by sending it through the post in a prepaid
	letter addressed to them by name, or by the title of representatives of the
	deceased, or assignee of the bankrupt, or by any like description, at the
	address, if any, supplied for the purpose by the persons claiming to be so
	entitled, or (until such an address has been so supplied) by giving the notice
	in any manner in which the same might have been given if the death or bankruptcy
	had not occurred.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV ID="PGBRK" STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID="FTR">
<DIV ID="GLFTR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">

</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PN" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	43
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<HR STYLE="COLOR: BLACK" NOSHADE SIZE="2">
</DIV>

<A NAME="eolPage187"></A>
<DIV ID="HDR">
<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	WINDING
	UP
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	134.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Distribution of
	surplus assets
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	If the
	Company shall be wound up, subject to due provision being made satisfying the
	claims of any holders of shares having attached thereto any special rights in
	regard to the repayment of capital, the surplus assets shall be applied in
	repayment of the capital paid up or credited as paid up on the shares at the
	commencement of the winding up.&#160;&#160;If the surplus assets shall be
	insufficient to repay the whole of the capital paid up or credited as paid up on
	the shares, such assets shall be distributed (as nearly as practicable) in
	proportion to the capital paid up or credited as paid up on the shares at the
	commencement of the winding up.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	135.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Distribution of assets
	in specie
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	If the
	Company shall be wound up, the liquidators may, with the sanction of a special
	resolution, divide among the members in specie any part of the assets of the
	Company and any such division may be otherwise than in accordance with the
	existing rights of the members, but so that if any division&#160;&#160;is
	resolved or otherwise than in accordance with such rights, the members shall
	have the same right of dissent and consequential rights as if such resolution
	were a special resolution passed pursuant to Section 306 of the
	Act.&#160;&#160;A special resolution sanctioning a transfer or sale to another
	company duly passed pursuant to the said Section may in like manner authorise
	the distribution of any shares or other consideration receivable by the
	liquidators amongst the members otherwise than in accordance wit their existing
	rights; and any such determination shall be binding&#160;&#160;upon
	all&#160;&#160;the members subject to the right of dissent and consequential
	rights conferred by the said Section.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	136.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Service of notice by
	liquidator
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In the
	event of a winding up of the Company every member of the Company who is not for
	the time being in Singapore shall be bound, within 14 days after the passing of
	an effective resolution to wind up the Company voluntarily, or within the like
	period after the making of&#160;&#160;an order for the winding&#160;&#160;up of
	the&#160;&#160;Company, to serve notice in writing on the Company appointing
	some householder in Singapore upon whom all summonses, notices, processes,
	orders and judgments in relation to or under the winding up of the Company may
	be served, and in default of such nomination the liquidator of the Company shall
	be at liberty on behalf of such member to appoint some such person,
	and&#160;&#160;service upon any such appointee shall be deemed to be a good
	personal service on such member for all purposes, and where the liquidator makes
	any such appointment he shall, with all convenient speed, give notice thereof to
	such member by a registered letter sent through the post and addressed to such
	member at his address as appearing in the Register, and such notice shall be
	deemed to be served on the day following that on which the letter is
	posted
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV ID="PGBRK" STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID="FTR">
<DIV ID="GLFTR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>

	44
</FONT>

	INDEMNITY
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">

	137.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Indemnity of Directors
	and officers
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Every
	Director, Managing Director, agent, auditor, Secretary and other officer for the
	time being of the Company shall be indemnified out of the assets of the Company
	against any liability incurred by him in defending any proceedings whether civil
	or criminal in which judgment is given in his favour or in which he is acquitted
	or in connection&#160;&#160;with any application under Section 391 of the Act in
	which relief is granted to him by the Court in respect of any negligence,
	default, breach of duty or breach of trust.
</FONT>
</DIV>

	OF ATTORNEY
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	BY THIS
	POWER OF ATTORNEY given on the 22
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: SUPER">
	nd
</FONT>
	day of
	April 2010, Inter Parfums, S.A., a company incorporated in Paris, France and
	having its registered office at 4 rond-point des Champs, Elysees F-75008, Paris,
	France hereby appoints Mr. Philippe Benacin, Passport no. 09AR50223 of 17 April
	2009 (hereinafter called &#8220;the Attorney&#8221;), its true and lawful attorney and the
	attorney be and is hereby authorized to subscribe on behalf of Inter Parfums,
	S.A. to the Memorandum and Articles of Associate of a company to be incorporated
	in Singapore and to be known as
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Interparfums Singapore Pte.
	Ltd.
</FONT>
	(the &#8220;Company&#8221;) for one ordinary share valued at S$1.00 in the
	capital of the Company and to sign any other documents requiring execution by
	Inter Parfums, S.A. relating to the incorporation of such Company.
</FONT>

<EFX_EXHIBIT_3>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_3_3"></A>
<DIV>
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<B>
	EXHIBIT 3.10
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<EFX_CERTIFICATE_OF_INCORPORATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATE_OF_INCORPORATION"></A>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	CERTIFICATE
	OF INCORPORATION
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT ID="TAB1" STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT">
</FONT>
	FIRST:&#160;&#160;The name of this
	corporation shall be: INTERPARFUMS LUXURY BRANDS, INC.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;SECOND:&#160;&#160;Its
	registered office in the State of Delaware is to be located at 2711 Centerville
	Road, Suite 400, in the City of Wilmington, County of New Castle and its
	registered agent at such address is CORPORATION SERVICE COMPANY.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT ID="TAB1" STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT">
</FONT>
	THIRD:&#160;&#160;The purpose or
	purposes of the corporation shall be:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 108PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	To engage
	in any lawful act or activity for which corporations may be organized under the
	General Corporation Law of Delaware.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;FOURTH:&#160;&#160;The
	total number of shares of stock which this corporation is authorized to issue
	is:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	1,000
	shares of Common Stock, no par value.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT ID="TAB1" STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT">
</FONT>
	FIFTH:&#160;&#160;The name and address
	of the incorporator is as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Joseph A.
	Caccamo
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	13 Maack
	Road
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Pottstown,
	PA 19465
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT ID="TAB1" STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT">
</FONT>
	SIXTH:&#160;&#160;The Board of
	Directors shall have the power to adopt, amend or repeal the
	by-laws.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT ID="TAB1" STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT">
</FONT>
	SEVENTH:&#160;&#160;No director shall
	be personally liable to the Corporation or its stockholders for monetary damages
	for any breach of fiduciary duty by such director as a
	director.&#160;&#160;Notwithstanding the foregoing sentence, a director shall be
	liable to the extent provided by applicable law, (i) for breach of the
	director's duty of loyalty to the Corporation or its stockholders, (ii) for acts
	or omissions not in good faith or which involve intentional misconduct or a
	knowing violation of law, (iii) pursuant to Section 174 of the Delaware General
	Corporation Law or (iv) for any transaction from which the director derived an
	improper personal benefit.&#160;&#160;No amendment to or repeal of this Article
	Seventh shall apply to or have any effect on the&#160;&#160;liability or alleged
	liability of any director of the Corporation for or with respect to any acts or
	omissions of such director occurring prior to such amendment.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT ID="TAB1" STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT">
</FONT>
	IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the undersigned,
	being the incorporator herein before named, has executed signed and acknowledged
	this certificate of incorporation this 31st day of March, 2010.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="RIGHT">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="50%">
<TR>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 2PX SOLID">
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE">
	/s/ Joseph A. Caccamo
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="100%">
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Joseph
	A. Caccamo, Incorporator
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
	&#160;

<DIV ID="FTR">
<DIV ID="GLFTR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">

<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

	PAGE

<TR>

	Emplacements de stationnement de v&#233;hicules l&#233;gers&#160;: 164

	tranche. L&#8217;option de cette extension est conf&#233;r&#233;e au PRENEUR pour une dur&#233;e
	expirant le 30 avril 2012.

	du d&#233;p&#244;t compl&#233;mentaire en date du 30 avril 2010 il a &#233;t&#233; apport&#233; des
	modifications &#224; la requ&#234;te initiale en vue d&#8217;adapter l&#8217;autorisation requise au

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Savoir en
	l&#8217;int&#233;gration de la facult&#233; d&#8217;entreposer les produits inflammables sur
	l&#8217;int&#233;gralit&#233; de la superficie des cellules pour autant que la hauteur n&#8217;exc&#232;de
	pas 5m, que les dits produits inflammables soient contenus dans des flacons en
	verre d&#8217;une contenance n&#8217;exc&#233;dant pas&#160;&#160;100 ml et pour une quantit&#233;
	globale inf&#233;rieure &#224; 190 litres par palettes conform&#233;ment &#224; l&#8217;avis du CNPP du 18
	D&#233;cembre 2009.

</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">

	(ii)

<TD>

	Arr&#234;t&#233;
	de permis de construire d&#233;livr&#233; le 2 d&#233;cembre 2008 sous num&#233;ro
	027&#160;188 08 A0022 et autorisant la construction dudit b&#226;timent,
	d&#233;finitif en l&#8217;absence de recours des tiers et de retrait par l&#8217;autorit&#233;
	administrative, ci-apr&#232;s annex&#233; en

	Annexe
	4

<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

	Teneur des
	D&#233;finitions
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Les
	termes et expressions &#233;nonc&#233;s ci-apr&#232;s auront dans le corps de ce Contrat et de
	ses annexes les significations suivantes :
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Annexe(s)"
</FONT>
	signifie le ou les
	annexes au pr&#233;sent Contrat.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Architecte de l'Immeuble"
</FONT>
	signifie l'architecte d&#233;sign&#233; par le Bailleur pour surveiller l'&#233;tat de
	l'Immeuble et les travaux de quelque nature que ce soit pouvant &#234;tre effectu&#233;s
	dans l'Immeuble.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Autorisation d'Exploiter"
</FONT>
	signifie l'autorisation qui sera d&#233;livr&#233;e par la Pr&#233;fecture conform&#233;ment &#224; la
	demande dont une copie a d&#233;j&#224; &#233;t&#233; remise au Preneur et celle r&#233;sultant de la
	demande compl&#233;mentaire figurant en
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Annexe 3
</FONT>
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Bail"
</FONT>
	signifie le bail
	commercial soumis aux articles L. 145-1 &#224; L. 145-60 et R.145-1 &#224; R.145-33 du
	Code de commerce (ainsi qu'aux dispositions non abrog&#233;es du D&#233;cret n&#176; 53-960 du
	30 septembre 1953), objet du pr&#233;sent Contrat, ainsi que tous avenants de
	celui-ci.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Bail Commercial"
</FONT>
	signifie un
	bail commercial soumis aux articles L. 145-1 &#224; L. 145-60 et R.145-1 &#224; R.145-33
	du Code de commerce (ainsi qu'aux dispositions non abrog&#233;es du D&#233;cret n&#176; 53-960
	du 30 septembre 1953).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>

	personne d&#233;nomm&#233;e en t&#234;te des pr&#233;sentes en premi&#232;re part, propri&#233;taire de
	l'Immeuble, et tout ayant-droit de celle-ci.

<DIV>

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	-
</FONT>

</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Les
	journ&#233;es d'intemp&#233;ries o&#249; le travail est arr&#234;t&#233;; pour &#234;tre prises en
	compte, ces journ&#233;es d'intemp&#233;ries devront avoir entra&#238;n&#233; un r&#233;el arr&#234;t de

	d&#8217;ex&#233;cution

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	-
</FONT>

</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Un
	relev&#233; de la station m&#233;t&#233;orologique la plus proche du chantier devra
	mettre en &#233;vidence, l'une des trois conditions suivantes
	:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 63PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#8226;
	intemp&#233;ries de froid&#160;: temp&#233;ratures inf&#233;rieures ou &#233;gales &#224; 0&#176;C ou neige
	ininterrompue
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 63PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#8226; pour
	les grues engins de levage nacelles et travaux sur la couverture et fa&#231;ades
	ext&#233;rieures, vent de 50 km/h entre 6 et 18 heures; ou pr&#233;sences de rafales non
	constantes
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 63PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#8226;
	intemp&#233;ries de pluie avant que le b&#226;timent ne soit clos et couvert, ou pour tout
	travaux d&#8217;ext&#233;rieurs pr&#233;cipitations sup&#233;rieures &#224; 10 ml d'eau entre 6 et 18
	heures ou pr&#233;cipitations exc&#233;dant 20 cm d&#8217;eau dans les 24
	heures&#160;pr&#233;c&#233;dentes
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	- Les
	jours de retard cons&#233;cutifs &#224; une gr&#232;ve g&#233;n&#233;rale ou particuli&#232;re aux activit&#233;s
	touchant l'industrie du b&#226;timent ou &#224; ses industries annexes, sauf les gr&#232;ves
	particuli&#232;res au chantier.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	- Les
	jours de retard dus &#224; l&#8217;interruption de l&#8217;approvisionnement du chantier du fait
	de gr&#232;ves des transports, manifestations ou r&#233;quisition de l&#8217;autorit&#233;
	publique
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	- Les
	injonctions administratives ou judiciaires de suspendre ou d'arr&#234;ter les travaux
	ou encore de r&#233;duire les heures d'ouverture de chantier (&#224; moins que celles-ci
	ne soient fond&#233;es sur des fautes ou n&#233;gligences imputables au Vendeur ou des
	intervenants &#224; l&#8217;op&#233;ration de construction).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	- Les
	troubles r&#233;sultant d&#8217;hostilit&#233;s, actes de guerre, &#233;meutes, terrorisme,
	cataclysmes et r&#233;volutions pour autant que ces &#233;v&#233;nements aient effectivement
	entra&#238;n&#233; un retard dans la progression des travaux.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	- Les
	incendies et sinistres affectant le chantier, sauf faute(s) ou n&#233;gligence des
	intervenants &#224; l&#8217;op&#233;ration de construction.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	- Les cas
	de force majeure.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Ces
	&#233;v&#233;nements ne pourront en tout &#233;tat de cause &#234;tre consid&#233;r&#233;s comme des causes
	l&#233;gitimes de retard que s&#8217;ils sont d&#233;nonc&#233;s au Preneur par lettre RAR dans les 8
	jours au plus tard de leur survenance et sous r&#233;serve que soit notifi&#233; un
	nouveau calendrier de livraison.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Le
	calendrier de r&#233;alisation de l&#8217;Immeuble stipul&#233; au pr&#233;sent bail pour la
	livraison comprend d&#233;j&#224; forfaitairement 10 jours d&#8217;intemp&#233;ries.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Est
	consid&#233;r&#233; comme un cas de force majeure tout &#233;v&#233;nement suivant impr&#233;visible,
	irr&#233;sistible, et
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	totalement ext&#233;rieur &#224;
	la personne du Vendeur et ou Bailleur, et &#224; l'un quelconque de ses contractants
	et/ou de leur pr&#233;pos&#233;, et plus largement de toute personne autoris&#233;e &#224; p&#233;n&#233;trer
	sur le chantier par le Vendeur et/ou ses contractants et/ou
	pr&#233;pos&#233;.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PGBRK" STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID="FTR">
<DIV ID="GLFTR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="LEFT">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PN" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Page 7
	sur 46
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<HR STYLE="COLOR: BLACK" NOSHADE SIZE="2">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage199"></A>
<DIV ID="HDR">
<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="RIGHT">
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Sans que
	la liste ci-apr&#232;s soit limitative, les Parties consid&#232;rent notamment comme cas
	de force majeure, les &#233;v&#232;nements suivants&#160;: foudre, cyclones, inondations,
	tremblement de terre ou tous autres ph&#233;nom&#232;nes naturels &#224; caract&#232;re
	catastrophique, chute d'a&#233;ronef, rupture g&#233;n&#233;rale d'approvisionnement en &#233;nergie
	n&#233;cessaire pour la r&#233;alisation du chantier, mouvements populaires, les effets
	directs ou indirects d'explosions, de d&#233;gagements de chaleur, d'irradiations
	provenant de la transmutation du noyau d'atomes ou de radioactivit&#233;, effets
	d&#8217;irradiations provoqu&#233;es par l'acc&#233;l&#233;ration de particules.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Charges et Accessoires"
</FONT>
	signifie toutes sommes mises &#224; la charge du Preneur en vertu de ce Contrat en
	sus du Loyer en principal, notamment et sans que la pr&#233;sente liste ait un
	caract&#232;re limitatif, les Charges Communes ainsi que les sommes vis&#233;es aux
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	articles 7,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	et
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	9
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Charges Communes"
</FONT>
	signifie
	les charges communes telles que&#160;:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	- les
	frais et honoraires du gestionnaire de l'Immeuble, les frais et honoraires de
	l'AFUL, des &#233;quipements de la zone et autres...
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	- les
	d&#233;penses relatives au fonctionnement de l'Immeuble de ses &#233;quipements et de
	leurs entretiens, ainsi que de ses consommations telles que : eau, &#233;lectricit&#233;,
	gaz, vapeur, eau glac&#233;e, t&#233;l&#233;phone, ou autres ,les d&#233;penses li&#233;es &#224; la mise en
	conformit&#233; de l'Immeuble avec la R&#233;glementation Applicable, le co&#251;t des primes
	des assurances, Taxes Fonci&#232;res et impositions auxquelles l&#8217;immeuble est
	assujetti les frais de main-d'&#339;uvre, salaires, charges sociales et fiscales du
	personnel charg&#233; de l'ex&#233;cution des t&#226;ches concernant des services ou
	prestations assur&#233;s dans l'Immeuble , etc.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Contrat"
</FONT>
	signifie l'ensemble
	des documents composant le pr&#233;sent Contrat, toutes ses annexes auxquelles il est
	fait r&#233;f&#233;rence, tous avenants ou modificatifs (&#224; l'exclusion de tous autres
	documents et notamment de ceux &#233;tablis ou &#233;chang&#233;s entre les parties
	pr&#233;alablement &#224; la date des pr&#233;sentes en vue de la signature du pr&#233;sent Contrat)
	le tout sign&#233; et approuv&#233; par les Parties.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Date de Livraison"
</FONT>
	signifie
	la date de Livraison.&#224; savoir le 15 avril 2011.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Date de Prise d'Effet du
	Bail"
</FONT>
	d&#233;signe la date de prise d'effet du Bail, &#224; savoir le 1
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: SUPER">
	er
</FONT>
	juin
	2011.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Descriptif Technique"
</FONT>
	signifie le descriptif d&#233;taillant les caract&#233;ristiques techniques, les
	normes, la qualit&#233; des mat&#233;riaux et mat&#233;riels devant &#234;tre utilis&#233;s pour la
	r&#233;alisation des travaux de construction du B&#226;timent ainsi que leurs mode
	d'utilisation et les conditions g&#233;n&#233;rales d'ex&#233;cution, dont une copie figure en
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Annexe 2
</FONT>
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Destination"
</FONT>
	signifie
	l'utilisation pouvant &#234;tre faite de l'Immeuble et les activit&#233;s pouvant y &#234;tre
	exerc&#233;es conform&#233;ment &#224; l'
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	article
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	5
</FONT>
	de ce Contrat.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Etat des Lieux"
</FONT>
	signifie
	l'&#233;tat des lieux &#233;tabli contradictoirement par le Bailleur et le Preneur ou par
	huissier de justice, en pr&#233;sence du Bailleur et du Preneur, qui sera dress&#233; le
	jour de la livraison.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#171;&#160;Expert&#160;&#187;
</FONT>
	signifie
	la personne d&#233;sign&#233;e par les parties pour
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	R&#233;gler les litiges li&#233;s
	&#224; l&#8217;&#233;tat du B&#226;tliment lors de la Livraison.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Force Majeure"
</FONT>
	constitue un
	cas de force majeure, les gr&#232;ves, mouvements sociaux, incendies, inondations et
	autres &#233;v&#233;nements impr&#233;visibles ou incidents irr&#233;sistibles ind&#233;pendants de la
	volont&#233; de l'une des parties, troubles r&#233;sultant d'&#233;meutes, r&#233;volutions,
	cataclysmes ou guerres.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>

	Page 8
	sur 46

<DIV ID="HDR">
<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="RIGHT">
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Groupe"
</FONT>
	signifie le groupe au
	sens de l'article L. 233-3-I du Code de commerce.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Immeuble"
</FONT>
	signifie l'immeuble
	plus amplement d&#233;sign&#233; au paragraphe (A) de l'Expos&#233; ci-dessus, les Parties
	Communes, ainsi que toutes les installations et &#233;quipements destin&#233;s &#224; l'usage
	de l'Immeuble ou des Parties Communes de celui-ci et dans lequel se trouvent les
	Locaux.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Int&#233;r&#234;ts de Retard"
</FONT>
	signifie
	les int&#233;r&#234;ts dus sur toute somme due par le Preneur au Bailleur en vertu de ce
	Contrat et non pay&#233;e &#224; la date d'exigibilit&#233;, au taux l&#233;gal en France en vigueur
	lors de la date d'exigibilit&#233; de la somme due, major&#233; de
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	[&#8212;&#8212;&#8212;-]
</FONT>
	%
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: SUPER">
	7
</FONT>
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;

<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_71"></A>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"I.N.S.E.E."
</FONT>
	signifie
	l'Institut National des Statistiques et des Etudes Economiques.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Jour(s)"
</FONT>
	signifie jour
	calendaire.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Livraison"
</FONT>
	signifie la mise &#224;
	disposition des Locaux apr&#232;s ach&#232;vement par le Bailleur au profit du Preneur,
	dans les conditions pr&#233;vues &#224; l&#8217;article 2.3.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Locaux"
</FONT>
	signifie tout ou
	partie de l'Immeuble plus amplement d&#233;crit et identifi&#233; sur les plans et sur le
	descriptif formant l'
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Annexe 1
	et 2
</FONT>
	ainsi que lesdits locaux s'&#233;tendent, se poursuivent et comportent
	ainsi que toutes les installations et &#233;quipements destin&#233;s &#224; l'usage exclusif
	desdits Locaux.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Loyer"
</FONT>
	signifie le loyer
	annuel hors taxe et hors Charges et Accessoires payable au moment consid&#233;r&#233; au
	titre du Bail, tel qu'il ressort des stipulations de l'
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	article 6.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#171;&#160;Mise &#224;
	disposition&#160;&#187;
</FONT>
	signifie la mise &#224; disposition progressive des Locaux
	&#224; compter du 15 f&#233;vrier 2011 jusqu&#8217;au 15 avril 2011 par cellules et sous r&#233;serve
	de justification d&#8217;assurance par le Preneur.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Partie(s)"
</FONT>
	signifie chaque
	partie ou toutes les parties au Contrat.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Parties Communes"
</FONT>
	signifie
	les parties communes en ce compris leurs installations et &#233;quipements de
	l'Immeuble, telles que d&#233;finies &#224; l'
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Annexe 5
</FONT>
	(liste des parties
	communes &#224; &#233;tablir comprenant les installations et locaux de sprinklage,
	chaufferie, gardiennage ...).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Preneur"
</FONT>
	signifie la personne
	d&#233;nomm&#233;e en t&#234;te des pr&#233;sentes en seconde part, ou tout cessionnaire de celle-ci
	dans les cas autoris&#233;s conform&#233;ment aux stipulations de ce Contrat, &#224;
	l'exclusion de toute autre personne.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"R&#232;glement int&#233;rieur"
</FONT>
	signifie
	en tant que de besoin le r&#232;glement int&#233;rieur d&#233;finissant l'organisation et la
	gestion de l'Immeuble.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"R&#233;glementation Applicable"
</FONT>
	signifie tous les trait&#233;s, directives, lois, d&#233;crets, r&#232;glements, instructions,
	arr&#234;t&#233;s, circulaires, codes, usages, pratiques, r&#232;gles de l'Art et normes, ainsi
	que les d&#233;cisions, ordres, injonctions, instructions et recommandations des
	autorit&#233;s comp&#233;tentes, applicables tant &#224; l'Immeuble qu'aux Parties, y compris
	notamment dans le domaine de la protection de l'environnement, de l'hygi&#232;ne, de
	la sant&#233; publique, de la s&#233;curit&#233; des biens et des personnes applicables en
	mati&#232;re de construction, aux b&#226;timents, &#224; l'exploitation et &#224; l'occupation de
	biens immobiliers.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"T.V.A."
</FONT>
	signifie taxe sur la
	valeur ajout&#233;e.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<DIV>
<HR STYLE="COLOR: BLACK" ALIGN="LEFT" NOSHADE SIZE="1" WIDTH="100%">

<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	D&#233;lais &#8211;&#8211; conditions
	particuli&#232;res relatives au d&#233;lai de Livraison
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	constituant la premi&#232;re
	phase
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Le
	Bailleur, en ex&#233;cution du pr&#233;sent Contrat, s'oblige envers le Preneur &#224; faire
	&#233;difier l'Immeuble [les Locaux] conform&#233;ment au Descriptif Technique en deux
	phases.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Les
	Locaux [l'Immeuble] constituant la premi&#232;re phase devront &#234;tre achev&#233;s et livr&#233;s
	au Preneur, au plus tard le 15 Avril 2011.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	La Date
	Limite d'Ach&#232;vement sera d&#233;cal&#233;e en cas de survenance d'une Cause L&#233;gitime de
	Retard au-del&#224; du d&#233;lai de 10 jours inclus au calendrier. S'il survenait une
	Cause L&#233;gitime de Retard, sous r&#233;serve que ces causes l&#233;gitimes de retard soient
	d&#233;nonc&#233;s au Preneur par lettre RAR dans les 8 jours au plus tard de leur
	survenance et sous r&#233;serve que soit notifi&#233; un nouveau calendrier de livraison
	la Date Limite d'Ach&#232;vement serait diff&#233;r&#233;e d'un temps &#233;gal &#224; celui pendant
	lequel l'&#233;v&#232;nement consid&#233;r&#233; aurait mis obstacle &#224; la poursuite des
	travaux
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 70.9PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2.2
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	D&#233;lais &#8211;&#8211; conditions
	particuli&#232;res relatives au d&#233;lai de Livraison&#160;&#160;constituant la
	deuxi&#232;me phase
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Les
	Locaux [l'Immeuble] constituant la seconde phase devront &#234;tre achev&#233;s et livr&#233;s
	au Preneur, au plus tard le 30 Avril 2013 en cas de lev&#233;e de l&#8217;option ci-apr&#232;s
	stipul&#233;e.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Le
	Preneur n&#8217;ayant pas &#224; ce jour pris une d&#233;cision ferme quant &#224; sa volont&#233; de
	prendre &#224; bail les locaux constituant la deuxi&#232;me phase La construction de celle
	ci n&#233;cessitant l&#8217;obtention d&#8217;un permis de construire compl&#233;mentaire de [
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	&#8212;&#8212;&#8212;-]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: SUPER">
	8
</FONT>
</FONT>
</FONT>
</FONT>
	SHON au permis obtenu et &#224; une autorisation d&#8217;exploiter modificative il a &#233;t&#233;
	convenu ce qui suit&#160;:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	A compter
	du 15 avril 2011, le Bailleur d&#233;posera une demande de permis de construire
	compl&#233;mentaire &#224; l&#8217;effet de permettre l&#8217;&#233;dification des [
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	&#8212;&#8212;&#8212;-]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: SUPER">
	9
</FONT>
</FONT>
</FONT>
</FONT>
	SHON constituant la deuxi&#232;me tranche.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Dans les
	dix jours cons&#233;cutifs &#224; ce d&#233;p&#244;t, le Preneur alors devenu exploitant d&#233;posera
	une demande d&#8217;autorisation d&#8217;exploiter modificative. Le dossier de demande
	d&#8217;autorisation sera r&#233;dig&#233; en concours avec le Bailleur avec le concours du
	cabinet d&#8217;environnement ayant proc&#233;d&#233; &#224; l&#8217;&#233;tude du dossier originel, dont le
	co&#251;t sera pris en charge par le Bailleur.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Les
	parties s&#8217;obligent &#224; s&#8217;informer mutuellement des &#233;changes et r&#233;ponses avec les
	services de l&#8217;administration au cours de l&#8217;instruction de ces
	dossiers.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Le
	Preneur disposera d&#8217;un d&#233;lai expirant le 30 Avril 2012 pour requ&#233;rir le Bailleur
	de faire construire les locaux constituant la 2&#232;me phase.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<DIV>
<HR STYLE="COLOR: BLACK" ALIGN="LEFT" NOSHADE SIZE="1" WIDTH="100%">
</DIV>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: SUPER">
	8
</FONT>
	Confidential information omitted and filed separately with the SEC with a
	request for confidential treatment by Inter Parfums, Inc., no.
	10.144.8.
</FONT>

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2.3
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Ach&#232;vement des travaux &#8211; mise &#224;
	disposition des Locaux
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 78PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	D&#233;finition
	de l'ach&#232;vement
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Les
	constructions seront consid&#233;r&#233;es comme achev&#233;es, lorsque seront ex&#233;cut&#233;s les
	ouvrages et seront install&#233;s les &#233;l&#233;ments d'&#233;quipement conform&#233;ment au permis de
	construire, au Descriptif Technique, au Descriptif Technique des Travaux
	Preneur, aux r&#232;gles de l'art et aux normes et &#224; la R&#233;glementation Applicable &#224;
	la Date de Livraison, compte tenu de la destination et de la nature des
	Locaux.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	A cet
	&#233;gard, il est pr&#233;cis&#233;, conform&#233;ment aux dispositions l&#233;gales en vigueur (article
	R.261-1 du Code de la construction et de l'habitation), et par transposition de
	ces r&#232;gles, que pour l'appr&#233;ciation de cet ach&#232;vement, les d&#233;fauts de conformit&#233;
	ne sont pas pris en consid&#233;ration lorsqu'ils n'ont pas un caract&#232;re substantiel.
	Il en est de m&#234;me des malfa&#231;ons ne rendant pas l'ouvrage ou les &#233;l&#233;ments
	d'&#233;quipements impropres &#224; leur utilisation.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Les
	malfa&#231;ons, imperfections et non conformit&#233;s pourront faire l'objet de r&#233;serves
	de la part du Preneur selon la proc&#233;dure d&#233;crite ci-dessous &#224; l'
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	article
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	2.3(b)
</FONT>
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 78PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Livraison
	et lev&#233;e des r&#233;serves
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 70.3PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(i)
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Visite
	pr&#233;alable &#224; la Livraison des Locaux
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 108PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Le
	Bailleur informera, 10 jours auparavant, le Preneur, par lettre recommand&#233;e avec
	demande d'avis de r&#233;ception, du calendrier pr&#233;vu pour une visite pr&#233;alable &#224; la
	Livraison, 10 Jours au moins avant la date pr&#233;vue pour la Date de
	Livraison.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 108PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Son objet
	est de permettre au Preneur de formuler ses observations quant &#224; l'ex&#233;cution des
	travaux. L'ensemble des&#160;&#160;mises en service, r&#233;glages, tests et
	contr&#244;les devra &#234;tre achev&#233; &#224; la Date de Livraison (&#233;tant pr&#233;cis&#233; que les
	ajustements concernant le chauffage et la climatisation si elle existe seront
	r&#233;alis&#233;s post&#233;rieurement &#224; la Date de Livraison s'ils ne peuvent &#234;tre r&#233;alis&#233;s
	avant la Date de Livraison compte tenu des conditions climatiques existant &#224;
	cette date).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 108PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Le
	Bailleur s'engage &#224; formuler dans le proc&#232;s-verbal de r&#233;ception des travaux
	devant intervenir entre le Bailleur et le Constructeur, l'ensemble des
	observations formul&#233;es par le Preneur lors de cette visite et qui n&#8217;auraient pas
	&#233;t&#233; lev&#233;es &#224; la r&#233;ception.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 70.3PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Proc&#233;dure
	de Livraison et Date de Livraison
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 108PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Le
	Bailleur convoquera le Preneur, par lettre recommand&#233;e avec demande d'avis de
	r&#233;ception exp&#233;di&#233;e au moins dix (10) Jours Ouvr&#233;s avant la date de
	Livraison.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 108PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Le proc&#232;s
	verbal contradictoire qui sera &#233;tabli vaudra &#233;tat des lieux, et constatera la
	Livraison avec ou sans r&#233;serves des Locaux par le Bailleur. Le proc&#232;s-verbal
	sera &#233;tabli contradictoirement ou par huissier aux frais du
	Preneur.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>

	Page 12
	sur 46
</FONT>
