</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
	-
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	le
	cas &#233;ch&#233;ant, qu&#8217;il n&#8217;existe &#224; la date de l&#8217;attestation, aucune action
	judiciaire en cours ou de d&#233;saccord avec le Bailleur susceptible de
	d&#233;clencher une prochaine action
	judiciaire.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42.55PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
	-
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Le
	Bailleur s&#8217;engage &#224; informer le Preneur au plus tard dans les 15 jours de
	l&#8217;&#233;v&#233;nement de la cession de l&#8217;Immeuble ou de toute cession de contr&#244;le de
	la Soci&#233;t&#233; bailleresse.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	8.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	RESTITUTION DES LOCAUX EN FIN
	DE BAIL
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	A la fin
	du Bail pour quelque cause que ce soit et d&#232;s le d&#233;part du Preneur, il sera
	&#233;tabli un &#233;tat des lieux contradictoire soit par les Parties soit par acte
	d'huissier en pr&#233;sence des Parties et &#224; leurs frais partag&#233;s.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Cet &#233;tat
	des lieux comprendra notamment un relev&#233; des r&#233;parations, travaux, remises en
	&#233;tat, et travaux d'entretien mis &#224; la charge du Preneur en vertu du Bail et non
	effectu&#233;s par lui.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Le co&#251;t
	de r&#233;alisation desdites r&#233;parations et travaux sera chiffr&#233; soit par
	l'Architecte de l'Immeuble si les Parties sont d'accord, soit &#224; d&#233;faut d'accord
	par un expert d&#233;sign&#233; par ordonnance rendue par Monsieur le Pr&#233;sident du
	Tribunal de Grande Instance en la forme des r&#233;f&#233;r&#233;s &#224; la requ&#234;te du
	Bailleur.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Le co&#251;t
	chiffr&#233; par l'Architecte de l'Immeuble ou l'expert ainsi que les frais relatifs
	&#224; l'&#233;tablissement de l'&#233;tat des lieux, les honoraires de l'expert ou de
	l'Architecte de l'Immeuble seront support&#233;s par le Preneur et leur montant
	figurera dans l'arr&#234;t&#233; des comptes de fin de Bail vis&#233; &#224; l'
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	article
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	6.4(b)(iii)
</FONT>
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	9.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	CLAUSE
	RESOLUTOIRE
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Le
	Bailleur aura la facult&#233;, si bon lui semble, d'invoquer la r&#233;siliation de plein
	droit du Bail, sans qu'il soit besoin de faire ordonner cette r&#233;siliation en
	justice ni remplir aucune autre formalit&#233; dans l'une des hypoth&#232;ses suivantes
	:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 78PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#224;
	d&#233;faut de paiement int&#233;gral &#224; son &#233;ch&#233;ance d'un seul terme de loyer,
	Charges et Accessoires, ou toutes autres sommes dues par le Preneur en
	vertu du Bail, un (1) mois apr&#232;s un simple commandement de payer rest&#233;
	sans effet ;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 78PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	en
	cas d'inex&#233;cution par le Preneur de l'une des clauses, charges et
	conditions du Bail, un (1) mois apr&#232;s une simple sommation demeur&#233;e
	infructueuse d'avoir &#224; ex&#233;cuter la clause, charge ou condition en
	souffrance.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Si le
	Preneur refuse de quitter les lieux imm&#233;diatement, il sera expuls&#233; sur simple
	ordonnance de r&#233;f&#233;r&#233;, le tout nonobstant toutes offres, conciliations ou
	ex&#233;cutions ult&#233;rieures.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Dans tous
	les cas, le co&#251;t du commandement ou de la sommation et, &#233;ventuellement, les
	frais d'avocat ou d'huissier, devront &#234;tre rembours&#233;s par le Preneur au
	Bailleur.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	En outre,
	dans le cas o&#249; le Bailleur exercerait des poursuites ou prendrait des mesures
	conservatoires &#224; l'encontre du Preneur, il aura droit &#224; une indemnit&#233; fix&#233;e
	forfaitairement &#224; 10&#160;% des sommes pour lesquelles la proc&#233;dure serait
	engag&#233;e, ladite indemnit&#233; &#233;tant destin&#233;e &#224; le couvrir des frais divers et
	honoraires expos&#233;s pour le recouvrement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Dans tous
	les cas o&#249; le Bail serait r&#233;sili&#233; en ex&#233;cution du pr&#233;sent article, le Preneur
	sera tenu au paiement du loyer et des Charges et Accessoires jusqu'&#224; la date du
	d&#233;part du Preneur.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PGBRK" STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID="FTR">
<DIV ID="GLFTR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="LEFT">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PN" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Page 40
	sur 46
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<HR STYLE="COLOR: BLACK" NOSHADE SIZE="2">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage232"></A>
<DIV ID="HDR">
<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="RIGHT">
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	De plus,
	si, par des mesures dilatoires, le Preneur parvient &#224; se maintenir
	provisoirement dans l'Immeuble, il sera tenu de verser au Bailleur une indemnit&#233;
	d'occupation &#233;gale au double du loyer normal (plus le montant des Charges et
	Accessoires) non r&#233;visable, exigible pour la p&#233;riode s&#233;parant la date du cong&#233;
	ou de la r&#233;siliation et celle du d&#233;part effectif de l'Immeuble du Preneur, sans
	que le Bailleur soit tenu de justifier
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	d'un pr&#233;judice
	quelconque (tout mois commenc&#233; &#233;tant enti&#232;rement d&#251;).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	En outre,
	le montant du d&#233;p&#244;t de garantie restera acquis au Bailleur &#224; titre de clause
	p&#233;nale, sans pr&#233;judice du droit pour celui-ci de poursuivre par toutes voies de
	droit, le paiement des sommes dues par le Preneur, l'ex&#233;cution des conditions de
	ce Contrat (notamment en ce qui concerne la restitution de l'Immeuble) et le
	paiement de tous dommages-int&#233;r&#234;ts.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	10.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	PLAN DE PREVENTION DES RISQUES
	TECHNOLOGIQUES OU NATURELS
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 70.9PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	10.1
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Existence
	d'un plan de pr&#233;vention des risques technologiques
	(P.P.R.T.)&#160;&#160;et d'un plan de pr&#233;vention des risques naturels
	(P.P.R.N.)]
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Conform&#233;ment
	aux articles L. 125-5 et R. 125-23 &#224; R. 125-27 du Code de l'environnement, les
	locataires de biens immobiliers situ&#233;s dans une zone couverte par un P.P.R.T. ou
	par un P.P.R.N. prescrit ou approuv&#233;, ou dans un P.P.R.N. dont certaines
	dispositions ont &#233;t&#233; imm&#233;diatement rendues opposables ou encore dans une zone de
	sismicit&#233;, sont inform&#233;s par le bailleur de l'existence de ces
	risques.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Le
	Bailleur d&#233;clare, qu'&#224; sa connaissance, l'Immeuble n'est pas &#224; ce jour situ&#233;
	dans une zone couverte par un P.P.R.T ou un P.P.R.N. prescrit ou approuv&#233;, ou
	par un P.P.R.N. dont certaines dispositions ont &#233;t&#233; imm&#233;diatement rendues
	opposables ou encore dans une zone de sismicit&#233;. La consultation des Fichiers
	fait cependant appara&#238;tre sur PRIM Net que le site de Criquebeuf-sur-Seine est
	situ&#233; dans une zone de risque de Transport de Marchandises
	dangereuses.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Une copie
	de cet &#233;tat figure en Annexe 6.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Le
	Preneur d&#233;clare avoir parfaite connaissance de cet &#233;tat, s'en satisfaire et en
	faire son affaire personnelle sans recours contre le Bailleur.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 70.9PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	10.2
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Existence
	d'un sinistre ayant donn&#233; lieu &#224; une indemnit&#233; d'assurance "catastrophe
	naturelle" ou "catastrophe
	technologique"
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Selon les
	articles L. 125-5-IV et R. 125-27 du Code de l'environnement pr&#233;-cit&#233;s,
	lorsqu'un immeuble b&#226;ti a subi un sinistre ayant donn&#233; lieu au versement d'une
	indemnit&#233; en application de l'article L. 125-2 ou de l'article L. 128-2 du Code
	des assurances, le bailleur est tenu d'informer par &#233;crit le locataire de tout
	sinistre survenu pendant la p&#233;riode o&#249; il a &#233;t&#233; propri&#233;taire de l'immeuble ou
	dont il a &#233;t&#233; lui-m&#234;me inform&#233; en application desdites
	dispositions.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Le
	Bailleur d&#233;clare, qu'&#224; sa connaissance, l'Immeuble n'a subi aucun sinistre ayant
	donn&#233; lieu au versement d'une indemnit&#233; d'assurance garantissant les risques de
	catastrophes naturelles (art. L. 125-2 du Code des assurances) ou technologiques
	(art. L. 128-2 du Code des assurances).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	11.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	IMPUTATION DES
	R&#200;GLEMENTS
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	En cas de
	contentieux, l'imputation des paiements effectu&#233;s par le Preneur sera faite par
	le Bailleur dans l'ordre suivant :
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
	-
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	frais
	de recouvrement et de proc&#233;dure,
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>

	INDIVISIBILITE
</FONT>

	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 70.9PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	12.1
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Les
	parties conviennent express&#233;ment que l'Immeuble forme un tout indivisible.
	Le Bail est d&#233;clar&#233; indivisible au seul b&#233;n&#233;fice du
	Bailleur.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	En cas de
	cession et sous-location autoris&#233;es express&#233;ment par le Bailleur, le Preneur,
	les co-preneurs, cessionnaires, cessionnaires successifs et sous-locataires
	seront solidaires tant pour le paiement des loyers, Charges et Accessoires que
	pour l'ex&#233;cution des clauses, charges et conditions du Bail.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 70.9PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	12.2
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Ce
	Contrat exprime l'int&#233;gralit&#233; de l'accord des Parties relativement au Bail
	et annule et remplace toute convention ant&#233;rieure, &#233;crite ou verbale s'y
	rapportant directement ou
	indirectement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 70.9PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	12.3
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Toute
	modification du Bail ne pourra r&#233;sulter que d'un avenant sign&#233; par les
	deux Parties.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Une telle
	modification ne pourra en aucun cas &#234;tre d&#233;duite soit de la tol&#233;rance, soit de
	la passivit&#233; du Bailleur, celui-ci restant libre d'exiger &#224; tout moment et sans
	pr&#233;avis le respect et la compl&#232;te application de toutes les clauses et
	conditions du Bail.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	13.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	ENREGISTREMENT
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Les
	parties donnent tous pouvoirs au porteur d'un exemplaire de ce Contrat &#224; l'effet
	de requ&#233;rir aupr&#232;s du Bureau comp&#233;tent la formalit&#233; de
	l'Enregistrement.
</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Toute
	notification pr&#233;vue aux termes de ce Contrat devra pour &#234;tre valable, &#234;tre faite
	au domicile ci-apr&#232;s &#233;lu soit par lettre recommand&#233;e avec demande d'avis de
	r&#233;ception, soit par acte d'huissier.
</FONT>

	La
	premi&#232;re pr&#233;sentation d'une lettre recommand&#233;e vaudra r&#233;ception de
	celle-ci.
</FONT>

	Les
	Parties &#233;lisent domicile &#224; l'effet des pr&#233;sentes, de leurs suites et
	cons&#233;quences respectivement &#224; leurs adresses ci-dessus indiqu&#233;es.

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	A titre
	d&#233;rogatoire, pour la premi&#232;re ann&#233;e, les charges communes seront acquitt&#233;es
	trimestriellement par le Preneur au Bailleur sur pr&#233;sentation des
	factures.

	Une dur&#233;e
	de 9 ans &#224; compter de la Livraison, dont une p&#233;riode ferme de 4 ann&#233;es enti&#232;res
	et cons&#233;cutives, la facult&#233; de r&#233;siliation pr&#233;vue par l&#8217;article L 145-4 du Code
	de Commerce en fin de premi&#232;re p&#233;riode triennale sera report&#233;e en fin de
	quatri&#232;me ann&#233;e selon les m&#234;mes modalit&#233;s.
</FONT>

	&#8364;/m&#178; SHON major&#233; d&#8217;un

	[&#8212;&#8212;&#8212;-]

	49
</FONT>
	&#8364;/m&#178; SHON hors TVA, pour
	les superficies de dallage correspondant &#224; la normeT34 cat&#233;gorie 1, actualis&#233; de
	l&#8217;effet de la variation de l&#8217;indice du co&#251;t de la construction entre le jour de
	la prise d&#8217;effet du bail principal et le jour de la Livraison.

	des charges de l&#8217;exercice pr&#233;c&#233;dent au prorata des surfaces.

	Annexe 3
	&#8211; D&#233;p&#244;t compl&#233;mentaire d&#8217;autorisation d&#8217;exploiter

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Designation
	of a plot of land located at Criquebeuf sur Seine (27340), the "Le Bosc
	Hetrel" business park and land registry section ZD number 251, 252, 254,
	256, 258, 260, 262, 264, 266, 268, 56 , 57, 58, 59, 62, 63, 64, 65, 133,
	135, 136, 137, 194, 270 with an area of
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	[----------]

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: SUPER">
	1

<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Designation
	of the Building
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The
	building will represent
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	1/ In a
	first phase, an area of 31.006,16 m&#178; net floor area comprising:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	-
	Warehouse: 30,147.51 m&#178; net floor area with 5 cells and technical
	areas,
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	- Offices
	and Common Areas: 858.65 m&#178; net floor areas,
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	- Parking
	spaces for light vehicles: 164
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The
	delivery date for this phase is scheduled for April 15, 2011
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	2 / In a
	second phase:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The
	leased area will be extended by one or two new cells of
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	[----------&#178;]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: SUPER">
	2
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;for warehouse
	use for products of the same categories as those of the first section. This
	extension option is granted to the Lessee for a time period expiring April 30,
	2012.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Upon
	exercise of this option by the LESSEE, the said extension will be delivered no
	later than April 30, 2013.The leased area will be extended by an extension of
	one OR two new cells for warehouse use of
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	[----------]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: SUPER">
	3
</FONT>
	.
</FONT>

	In terms
	of the additional filing dated April 30, 2010, modifications were made to the
	initial request to adapt the required license to the Lessee's mode of
	operation.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 90PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This
	means the integration of the option to store flammable materials in the entire
	area of the cells provided however that the height does not exceed 5m, that the
	flammables are contained in glass vials with a capacity not exceeding 100 ml and
	for an overall quantity of less than 190 liters per pallet in accordance with
	the advice of the CNPP of December 18, 2009.
</FONT>

	HAS BEEN DECLARED AND AGREED AS FOLLOWS:
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

<DIV>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	1.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	DEFINITIONS-INTERPRETATIONS
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">

</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45PT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.2
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Force of
	Definitions
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The terms
	and expressions set out below in the body of this Contract and in its appendices
	shall have the following meanings:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Appendix(ces)"
</FONT>
	means the
	appendix(ces) to this Contract.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Building Architect"
</FONT>
	means the
	architect designated by the Lessor to monitor the status of the Building and the
	work of any nature whatsoever which may be carried out in the
	Building.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Operating license"
</FONT>
	means the
	authorization to be issued by the Prefecture in accordance with the request, a
	copy of which has already been provided to the Lessee as well as that arising
	out of the additional request appearing in
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Appendix 3
</FONT>
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Lease"
</FONT>
	means the commercial
	lease subject to Articles L. 145-1 to L. 145-60 and R.145-1 to R.145-33 of the
	Commercial Code (as well as the provisions not repealed of Decree No. 53-960 of
	September 30, 1953), subject of this Contract as well as all amendments to
	it.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Commercial Lease"
</FONT>
	means a
	commercial lease subject to Articles L. 145-1 to L. 145-60 and R.145-1 to
	R.145-33 of the Commercial Code (as well as the provisions not repealed by
	Decree No. 53-960 of September 30, 1953).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Lessor"
</FONT>
	means the person
	named in the beginning of this document in the first part, owner of the
	Building, and any beneficiary thereof.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Building"
</FONT>
	means the building
	more fully described in paragraph (b) of the above preamble.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Legitimate Reason(s) for
	Delay"
</FONT>
	means:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	-
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Days
	of bad weather where work is stopped; to be taken into account, these days
	of bad weather must have caused a real work stoppage declared by the prime
	contractor for the work
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	-
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	A
	record from the weather station closest to the worksite must show proof of
	one of the following three
	conditions:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 63PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#8226; Cold
	weather: temperatures at or below 0&#176; C or uninterrupted snowfall
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 63PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#8226; for the
	cranes for lifting equipment and aerial work on the roof and exterior facades,
	winds of 50 km/h between 6 am and 6 pm; or the presence of non-constant
	gusts
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 63PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#8226; rainy
	weather before the building is enclosed and covered, or for any work outside,
	precipitation greater than 10 ml of rainfall between 6 am or rainfall exceeding
	20 cm in the previous24 hours
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	- Delays
	due to a general strike or specific activities related to the building
	construction industry or its associated industries, except strikes specific to
	the worksite.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	- Delays
	due to an interruption in supplies for the worksite because of transportation
	strikes, demonstrations or requisitions by public authorities
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	-
	Administrative or legal injunctions to suspend or stop the work or to reduce the
	hours the worksite is open (as long as these are not based on negligence
	attributable to the Vendor or those involved in the construction
	operation).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	- Discord
	arising from hostilities, acts of war, riots, terrorism, disasters and
	revolutions in so far as these events have actually led to a delay in the
	progress of the work.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PGBRK" STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID="FTR">
<DIV ID="GLFTR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="LEFT">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PN" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Page 7 of
	46
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<HR STYLE="COLOR: BLACK" NOSHADE SIZE="2">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage245"></A>
<DIV ID="HDR">
<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="RIGHT">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	- Fires
	and disasters affecting the site, unless they are due to fault(s) or negligence
	of those involved in the construction operation.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	- Cases
	of force majeure.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	These
	events may in any case only be regarded as legitimate reasons for delay if they
	are reported to the Lessee by registered letter with delivery confirmation
	within 8 days of their occurrence and provided that a new delivery schedule is
	also notified.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The
	implementation schedule for the delivery of the Building provided in this lease
	already includes a total number of 10 days of bad weather.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Considered
	as a case of force majeure are any of the following events that are
	unforeseeable, uncontrollable and totally external to the person of the Seller
	and or Lessor, and to any of their contractors and/or their agents, and more
	generally any person authorized to enter the site by the Seller and/or his
	contractors and/or agents.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Without
	the list being limiting, Parties consider notably as a case of force majeure,
	the following events: lightning, hurricanes, floods, earthquake or any other
	natural phenomena of a catastrophic nature, falling aircraft, general breakdown
	of the energy supply necessary to carry out the construction, popular movements,
	direct or indirect effects of explosions, releases of heat, radiation from the
	transmutation of the nucleus of atoms or radioactivity, radiation effects caused
	by particle acceleration.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Charges and Accessories"
</FONT>
	means all amounts charged to the Lessee under this Contract in addition to the
	Rent in principal, including, and without this list having a limiting nature,
	Common Expenses and the amounts described in
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	articles 78
</FONT>
	and
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	9
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Common expenses"
</FONT>
	means the
	common expenses such as:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	- fees
	and honorariums for the Building manager, fees and honorariums for AFUL,
	equipment for the area and others ...
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	-
	expenses related to the operation of the Building and its equipment and its
	maintenance, as well as its consumption such as:&#160;&#160;water, electricity,
	gas, steam, chilled water, telephone, or others, expenses related to compliance
	of the Building with Applicable Regulations, the cost of insurance premiums,
	Real Estate Taxes and charges to which the building is subject, the costs of
	labor, wages, benefits and payroll taxes for the personnel responsible for
	carrying out&#160;&#160;tasks for services or benefits provided in the Building,
	etc..
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Contract"
</FONT>
	means all of the
	documents comprising this Contract, all of its appendices to which reference is
	made, any amendments or modifications (to the exclusion of all other documents
	and particularly those prepared or exchanged between the parties prior to the
	date hereof and the signing of this Contract) all of which have been signed and
	approved by the Parties.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Delivery Date"
</FONT>
	means the date
	of delivery which is April 15, 2011.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Effective Date of the Lease"
</FONT>
	means the date the lease comes into effect, which is June 1, 2011.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Technical Description"
</FONT>
	means
	the description detailing the technical specifications, standards, the quality
	of materials and equipment to be used to construct the building as well as their
	mode of use and the general conditions for their implementation, of which a copy
	is attached as
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Appendix
	2
</FONT>
	.

	accordance with

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"State of the Premises"
</FONT>
	means
	the state of the premises established in the presence of both the Lessor and the
	Lessee or by judicial bailiff in the presence of the Lessor and Lessee, which
	will be drawn up as an inventory on the day of delivery.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Expert"
</FONT>
	means the person
	designated by the parties to settle disputes related to the state of the
	Building at the time of delivery.
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Force Majeure"
</FONT>
	is a case of
	force majeure, strikes, social movements, fires, floods and other unpredictable
	events or uncontrollable incidents beyond the will of one of the parties,
	disturbances resulting from riots, revolutions, wars or disasters.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	"Group"
</FONT>
	means the group within
	the meaning of Article L. 233-3-I of the Commercial Code.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

	the building
	more fully described in paragraph0 of the preamble above, the Common Parts, as
	well as all facilities and equipment for the use of the Building or the Common
	Parts of it and in which the Premises are located.

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">

</FONT>
	means the making
	available of the Premises after completion by the Lessor for the benefit of the
	Lessee, in accordance with the conditions set out in Article 2.3.

	of the Building more fully described and identified on the plans and in the

	and 2

	and as far as these premises extend, continue and include as well
	as all of the facilities and equipment intended for the exclusive use of the
	said Premises.

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">

</FONT>
	means the
	progressive availability of the Premises from February 15, 2011 until April 15,
	2011 by cells and subject to proof of insurance by the Lessee.

	means
	all treaties, directives, laws, decrees, regulations, instructions, orders,
	circulars, codes, customs, practices, rules and standards of the industry, as
	well as the decisions, orders, injunctions, instructions and recommendations of
	the competent authorities, as applicable both to the Building and to the
	Parties, including notably the area of environmental protection, hygiene, public
	health, safety of goods and persons applicable in matters of construction,
	buildings, operations and occupancy of real estate property.

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(d)
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	reference
	to a document means this document, as it may be amended, replaced by
	novation or completed.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The term
	Lessor and Lessee defines the legal entity of the contractor, regardless of the
	number, the person or legal entity thereof, refers to his direct involvement or
	by proxy, and implies, unless otherwise expressly stated, solidarity in cases of
	multiple people, responding to the same denomination.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>

	1.4
</FONT>
</FONT>

<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

	parts

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The
	Parties agree to establish the Contract in two parts:
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: SUPER">
	st
</FONT>

	TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF CONSTRUCTION AND DELIVERY OF THE PREMISES

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: SUPER">
	nd

	CONDITIONS APPLICABLE FROM THE DATE THE LEASE COMES INTO EFFECT

<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The
	following is agreed upon concerning the carrying out of the construction work
	and its delivery.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">

</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2.1
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Time periods - specific
	conditions relative to the time period for Delivery
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	comprising the first
	stage
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The
	Lessor, pursuant to this Contract, is committed towards the Lessee to construct
	the Building [the Premises] in accordance with the Technical Specification in
	two phases.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The
	Premises [the Building] constituting the first stage will be completed and
	delivered to Lessee, no later than April 15, 2011.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The
	Deadline for Completion will be adjusted in the event of an occurrence of a
	Legitimate Reason for Delay beyond the 10 days included in the schedule. In the
	event of a Legitimate Reason for Delay, provided that these legitimate reasons
	for delay are reported to the Lessee by certified letter with return receipt
	within 8 days of their occurrence and provided that notice of a new delivery
	schedule is provided, the Deadline for Completion will be adjusted by a time
	equal to that during which the event in question would have been an obstacle to
	the continuation of the work.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">

<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

	conditions relative to the time period for Delivery comprising the second
	phase
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The
	Premises [the Building] constituting the second phase will be completed and
	delivered to the Lessee no later than April 30, 2013 in the event of the
	exercise of the option stipulated below.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The
	Lessee not having to this date taken a firm decision as to his willingness to
	lease the premises constituting the second phase, the construction of the latter
	requiring an additional building permit for the additional [
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	-------------&#178;]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: SUPER">
	8
</FONT>
	net floor area to the
	permit obtained and a modified operating license, the following has been
	agreed:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	As of
	April 15, 2011, the Lessor will file an application for an additional building
	permit to the effect of allowing the construction of the [
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	-------------]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: SUPER">
	9
</FONT>
	net floor area
	constituting the second section.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Within
	ten consecutive days of the filing of this application, the Lessee will then
	became operator and will file an application for a modified operating license.
	The file for the operating license will be drawn up in conjunction with the
	Lessor and with the environmental firm who carried out the study for the
	original file, the cost of which will be borne by the Lessor.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 45PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The
	Parties undertake to inform each other of the exchanges and responses of the
	administrative services during the process of completion of these
	files.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

	The
	Lessee shall have a period expiring April 30, 2012 to require the Lessor to
	construct the premises constituting the second phase.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>

	delivered to the Lessee, no later than April 30, 2013.
</FONT>

	&#160;
